long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
ğŸ”¥Accurately capture and efficiently download Instagram ad videos, TikTok ad library and Facebook ad library, watermark-free ad!
ad Library is your ultimate solution to get high definition watermark-free ad videos in the ad library. With this Chrome extension, you can batch download your favorite ad materials, not only improve your ad creativity, but also efficiently capture ad market trends!

âœ¨ Three simple steps to use the ad library:
1. Install the ad library extension into your browser.
2.Pin extend icons to the Chrome toolbar to keep them always within reach.
3. Browse the ad library, find the ad you want, and click the one-click save button in the ad library.

âœ¨ Advantages of using ad library:
Enhance the convenience of operation: The ad library realizes the batch download of ad.
Access your private ad library anytime, anywhere: Easily manage your ad save history and become a treasure trove for researching ad plans.
Full control of data: Obtain comprehensive ad parameters that you follow, including ad engagement, ad Call to Action, ad page links, etc.

âœ¨ More ad library features:
Quick screenshot: Add visual elements to ad analysis and capture selected ad moments with one click.
Huge ad material library: Own massive ad material warehouse, constantly updated, never miss the new trends in the ad market.

As a professional in the ad industry, you know how precious time is. The ad library is designed to save you time and enhance your creativity. Say goodbye to the complicated process of downloading ad videos and explore this powerful adlibrary extension now. 

ğŸ“¢ Customer Support: If you have any questions or suggestions, our customer service team is always ready to contact us through service@adlibrary.ai.

ğŸ“¢ Important notice:
The ad library has no connection with the official Instagram application. As an independent Google extension, it brings you an unprecedented experience of downloading ad. If you are planning your next ad campaign, don't miss the ad library. Download it now and let your ad creativity soar!
